A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm sure many Star Wars fans out there will know what I mean when I say it physically hurts when a Star Wars film is bad. The Last Jedi was one of these times. I left the cinema desperately trying to convince myself that what I had just watched was secretly a masterpiece\, instead of complete bollocks; but the more you think about The Last Jedi\, the more you begin to realise it's filled with character inconsistencies\, plot holes\, ill-timed humour\, vacuous characters\, and a complete disregard for the Star Wars mythos and lore. Avoid.
